Class Variable

  • java.lang.Object
    • Variable

  • public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    scottfloam and pratikkarnik

    Variable

    The Variable class contains information about the data being stored across the sites. Each Variable has an ID, value, intermediate value (used to hold information before it commits), whether it is exclusive to the Site, correspondingTransactions (Transaction that use this variable), and other critical information about the data used in this system.
